    Parameters:

    angle180

    public static double angle180(double radians)
    converts an angle in radians to be in the range PI to -PI. This assumes the angle is already in the range 2*PI to -2*PI as it does a simple subtraction or addition.

    Parameters:
    radians - the angle in radians.
    Returns:
    the angle in radians.

    angle90

    public static double angle90(double radians)
    converts an angle in radians to be in the range PI/2 to -PI/2. This assumes the angle is already in the range PI to -PI as it does a simple subtraction or addition.

    Parameters:
    radians - the angle in radians.
    Returns:
    the angle in radians.

    longitude180

    public static double longitude180(double radians)
    converts a longitude in radians to be in the range PI to -PI. This assumes the angle is already in the range 2*PI to -2*PI as it does a simple subtraction or addition.

    Parameters:
    radians - the longitude in radians.
    Returns:
    the angle in radians.

                                           ReferencedCoordinateSystem system)
    Clips an envelope to a coordinate system's horizon

    clipToHorizonFeature

                                                         CoordinateSystem fromSystem,
                                                         CoordinateSystem toSystem)
    Clips a feature to a horizon

    Parameters:
    oldGeom - the geometry to clip
    fromSystem - the coordinate system of oldGeom
    toSystem - the target coordinate system
    Returns:
    the clipped geometry in the toSystem coordinate system
